Notes.Text:
This update for evince fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-1010006: Fixed a buffer overflow in backend/tiff/tiff-document.c (bsc#1141619).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Evince 3.26.0 is affected by buffer overflow. The impact is: DOS / Possible code execution. The component is: backend/tiff/tiff-document.c. The attack vector is: Victim must open a crafted PDF file. The issue occurs because of an incorrect integer overflow protection mechanism in tiff_document_render and tiff_document_get_thumbnail.
